features: Multifunctional Kids Instant Print Camera - This children digital camera prints black&white photos instantly, is equipped with IPS screen,supports 12MP photo shooting, 1080P video recording, 16X the digital zoom, time lapse photo, recording at burst, and includes funny photo frames and different filters,MP3 and games, which makes this kids digital camera so multifunctional to record every significant moment of childhood.

Children Selfie Camera - The kids photo printed camera is equipped with 180°rotating selfie lens, built-in LED fill light, supports selfie and rear capture freely and take photos and videos anytime and anywhere,even in the dark .

Portable Kids Camera - The print out camera for kids with a 1000mAh rechargeable battery, a full charge can support continuous shooting for 3-5 hours. Type-C USB cable supports fast charging, it's very convenient for kids on the trip. What's more, a lanyard will come with our mini camera for kids, which is easy to carry around and convenient for children to keep track of their life.

Funny Kids Video Camera - The travel camera adopts Type-C charging technology, which can charge faster and save time.Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 2-3 hours after fully charged! Come with 1xUSB Type-C cable & 1xlanyard & 1x32GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!Take as many pictures as you want at anytime,anywhere, and seize every wonderful moment of joy.

Great Gift for Boys Girls - Our camera for kids is a great choice as a birthday or holiday gift for children aged 3-12. This children's instant print camera with powerful features but simple operation. It's perfect for boys and girls as birthday gifts, Christmas gifts, and children's day gifts. Kids can use it to take selfies, shoot Vlogs, and record every moment of life. Each printed photo holds memories of childhood, witnesses friendship and happiness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Instant Camera for kids - Best Gift for Girls and Boys This printed camera toy is educational and interactive, 12MP photography, 1080P video recording, print and paint photos, music and built-in 5 puzzle games are children's favourite entertainment, we put them together to stimulate children's desire and interest in photography. Super gift for kids.

Popular Holidays Travel Christmas Birthdays Gifts Previous page Next page More educational excitement and interactive fun, this mini camera toy is the perfect birthday, Easter, Christmas, holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3-12. In addition, your child will have their first own toy camera, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.

16X Digital Zoom This kids camera instant print is with16X digital zoom(zoom in to take photos), children can gain a larger and clearer field of view, recording precious childhood moments. If there is insufficient lighting, children selfie cameras can turn on the fill light, which will make the photo look clearer.

Multifunctional Toy Camera Built-in Multiple Funny Photo Frames To help children better record every meaningful moment of their childhood, the kids digital camera has built-in 6 kinds of scene filters and 17 kinds of cartoon photo frames & special effects, etc. Children can record their beautiful moments clearly through this instant print camera. Burst Shooting & Timer Shooting Our kid toy camera has burst shooting which can help kids freeze every wonderful moment of your party, activities and trip. And time-lapse shooting function which allows your kids to prepare before start taking photos, giving kids enough time to take photos.

1000mAh Rechargeable Camera This child camera has powerful battery life, and USB charging technology, fast and easy to charge. A full charge can support continuous shooting for 2-3 hours. Built-in 5 Games, Supports Listen to Music&Stories This kid's print camera combines entertainment and photography in one, built-in 5 funny games, which can exercise children's reaction ability and thinking abilities to a certain extent. Children can also listen to music and stories through the MP3 player as a way to relax and learn.

180-angle Adjustment Selfie Camera The kids selfie camera can easily achieve dual front and rear shots, allowing your child to capture HD images in all directions, captures and records important moment of childhood, let your child explore the fun of learning to take photos.

DIY Creative Graffiti This child print camera is equipped with 5 colorful pens, let kids enjoy DIY their own printed photos and create colorful fairy tale world, to stimulate the imagination and creativity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Kids!!!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter really wanted one of the Instant Polaroid cameras for Christmas but the price point was just not an option for us. I researched and read dozens and dozens of reviews for many cameras like this one. After reading reviews, I decided on this one because of the price, quality of the pictures, and user-friendly, specifically for children. This was a nonstop favorite for about four days straight after my daughter opened it. She’s eight years old and between her and my two other children, they went through an entire role of paper in two days! Nothing to worry about though because it came with two other rolls and the price for replacement is very very budget friendly! After reading other reviewers, it helped cut the time it took to figure out the best image settings in no time. Since then she has carried it around with her wherever we go ready to take photos. I big selling point for me on this one was the quality of the photos when they came out. I greatly appreciate other reviewers attaching a photo example with their reviews. For being a thermal printer, I thought it was excellent image quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instant print camera
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd camera I've bought so the it is not to pricy defiantly worth the money the image that it prints is really good I picked a pink 1 for my 8 year old granddaughter she loves the color of her camera it really is a cute lil thing I totally love them I give them to my grandchildren as presents they just love taking the photo and it printing off right on the spot it's so easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect childrens camera
reviews.reviewText: Perfect camera for kids! My daughter loves all the features and it was very easy for her to learn how to function it. She loves that she can instantly print pictures and decorate her cork board full of pictures. Perfect gift for any child thats not quite old enough to be responsible with a real camera just yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A huge hit!
reviews.reviewText: This camera was a gift for a 5 year old boy and he loved it! I want one of my own. So easy and fun to use. No need to worry about how many photos are being taken because there is no ink and the thermal paper is inexpensive. The addition of the digital frames and games are a bonus. I would 100% buy this camera again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Easy
reviews.reviewText: Gave these to my 5 and 9 year olds and they figured them out really quickly! I never had time to read the instruction book for the MP3 or games features - they just jumped to it and started taking photos. The photos are clear enough but not polaroid-style quality (almost gives it an artsy quality, especially when they color in the black & white printouts). Charges easily. Comes with plenty of printing paper, and I like seeing what they choose to take photos of in their little world. Excellent gift for any kid old enough to point & shoot a camera right up to high-school aged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Cute camera our daughter likes it. Only in black and white but great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for kids!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great! Pictures print instantly on receipt type paper. I love how affordable the camera and refills are. The camera also comes with some games, cute/silly filters and markers to add some color to your pictures. This was the highlight of Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old daughter has no trouble navigating the menus, turning printing on and off, and even found the arcade games it has.She loves the camera and brings it with her everywhere now.I recommend the dot printing method for the best photo quality.
